body_html:
It seems I can do

#!/bin/bash -u

but I don't think I can use env (which gives robustness to bash not installed in /bin)

#!/usr/bin/env bash -u

doesn't work because the -u doesn't get sent to bash.
body:
It seems I can do
```
#!/bin/bash -u
```
but I don't think I can use env (which gives robustness to bash not installed in /bin)
```
#!/usr/bin/env bash -u
```
doesn't work because the -u doesn't get sent to bash.
